macroSpec.desc: defines the range of attribute values used to express a truth value.
définit la gamme des valeurs d'attributs employés pour exprimer une valeur considérée comme vraie
define la gama de valores de atributos usados para expresar un valor cierto.
definisce la gamma di valori di attributi usati per esprimere un valore di verità

remarks.p: This datatype applies only for cases where uncertainty is inappropriate; if the attribute concerned may have a value other than true or false, e.g. "unknown", or "inapplicable", it should have the extended version of this datatype: data.xTruthValue
